item.title: Sermons
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1447717940808{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;background-image: url(http://rockythemes.com/creativo-church/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/sermons-bg.jpg?id=88) !important;}"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Sermons" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:45|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1" google_fonts="font_family:Lora%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][vc_custom_heading text="Our latest sermons" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:25|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1" google_fonts="font_family:Lora%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:400%20italic%3A400%3Aitalic"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1447718392175{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="What is a Sermon?" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:30|text_align:left" google_fonts="font_family:Lora%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]A sermon is an oration, lecture, or talk by a member of a religious institution or clergy. Sermons address a Biblical, theological, religious, or moral topic, usually expounding on a type of belief, law or behavior within both past and present contexts. Elements of the sermon often include exposition, exhortation and practical application. In Christianity, a sermon (also known as a homily within some churches) is usually delivered in a place of worship from an elevated architectural feature, variously known as a pulpit, a lectern, or an ambo. The word "sermon" comes from a Middle English word which was derived from Old French, which in turn came from the Latin word serm meaning "discourse".[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1447718192929{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_portfolio_el show_filters="no" show_icons="no" style="custom" port_title_color="#424242" port_bg_color="#f7f7f7" columns_normal="3" port_details="below" port_date="yes" items="9"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1447720932813{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-image: url(http://rockythemes.com/creativo-church/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/next-ev-bg.jpg?id=99) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_custom_heading text="Next event will start in" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:25|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.3" google_fonts="font_family:Lora%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1447721064296{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}"][countdown_el count_date="12/24/2015 12:00:00" count_offset="+2" count_style="custom" count_font_size="40px" count_font_color="#ffffff" count_details_font_color="#ffffff" border="4px" border_color="#ffffff" count_margin="5px"][vc_custom_heading text="Upcoming: The Power of Sharing" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:30|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.3" google_fonts="font_family:Lora%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1447720843856{padding-top: 20px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Do you not know? Have you not heard? The LORD is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He will not grow tired or weary, and his understanding no one can fathom.He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.

Even youths grow tired and weary, and young men stumble and fall; but those who hopein the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1447890033386{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column][recent_posts columns="3" style="custom" post_title_font_size="17px" posts="9"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1447890427481{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-image: url(http://rockythemes.com/creativo-church/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/famous-words.jpg?id=101) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Blessed Sayings" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:35|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1" google_fonts="font_family:Lora%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][vc_separator_2 style="line_symbol" icon_type="openiconic" color_line="#ebebeb" color_symbol="#ffffff" padding_bottom="30" icon_openiconic="vc-oi vc-oi-mic"][vc_testimonials timeout="4000" style="custom" font_weight="300"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Do you not know? Have you not heard? The LORD is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He will not grow tired or weary, and his understanding no one can fathom.

He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak. Even youths grow tired and weary, and young men stumble and fall; but those who hopein the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Peter Marshall
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: God will not permit any troubles to come upon us, unless He has a specific plan by which great blessing can come out of the difficulty.

item.title: Henry Ford
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: I believe God is managing affairs and that He doesn't need any advice from me. With God in charge, I believe everything will work out for the best in the end. So what is there to worry about.

item.title: John Lennon
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: I believe in God, but not as one thing, not as an old man in the sky. I believe that what people call God is something in all of us. I believe that what Jesus and Mohammed and Buddha and all the rest said was right. It's just that the translations have gone wrong.
